verbose_text: As revealed by the literature search, miR-17-3p that increases with APC and miR-19a that increases with IPC, respectively, block PTEN directly and increase pAkt via the PTEN / phosphoinositide 3-kinase (PI3K)/Akt pathway, whereas miR-27a, which decreases with APC, blocks PI3K directly and decreases pAkt, along with suppression of PTEN, although via different microRNAs, followed by equal increases in pAkt.
evidence: APC and miR-19a that increases with IPC
